website_summaries.verdict: Consistent high marks for an umbrella that’s been tested in winds up to 56 mph.
pros: A quality umbrella that’s also sturdy
Fiberglass shaft and ribs keeps the double canopy design umbrella light and strong
Reflective straps are a nice touch
cons: One-touch opener, but it has to be closed manually

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Amazing umbrella! Every other umbrella I had sort if just snaps and breaks down on me. But this umbrella really stood up to the test, it never flipped inside out even under super windy conditions and the alloy of rods stay pretty sturdy. I'm not sure about "lightning resistance" and hope to never test that out but its definitely good against rain and wind. Not only that, I dont have to lug it by carrying it, i just wrap it around my arm and go on my way and it drys pretty quickly. Although I have been teased at the office for bringing what looks like a sword instead of an umbrella. Definitely worthy of the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AMC Supreme

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I work outside and often find myself in the rain, so I needed a durable umbrella that I could easily (hands-free) carry around with me. The price for this umbrella isn't bad; be aware, though - the materials match it. The umbrella itself is comfortable, lightweight, and easy to open and close. The first heavy rain I experienced, I felt rain coming through the center. The sheath is cheap, flimsy, and a mess to use once the umbrella gets wet. I have a feeling mine will tear soon enough with enough use. Solid neutral for me. It's not the best umbrella, but I don't feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: You can buy the exact same one for 7 dollar less.
customer_reviews.text: I own both Hi & Dry and ACEIken Golf Umbrella. They are the same. It is obvious the factory makes the same one and attaches different names to it. I bought the Hi & Dry on sale for 19. Now it is 30. I bought the Aceiken for 23. The Umbrella is great but why pay more for the same thing?
customer_reviews.author: CaptainBeefHeart

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Went to an outdoor wedding where it ended up raining with high winds. This umbrella worked really well, didn't invert in the wind, and was large enough for two people to fit under and stay dry. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella with a friend's recommendation. Until now I had small folding umbrellas that were broken in the wind. This powerful umbrella will be really hard to break and it keeps you dry because it shelters a larger area.
customer_reviews.author: Nissan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, sturdy and keeps me completely dry!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, sturdy and keeps me completely dry! This umbrella is awesome. Great product. I purchased this umbrella because of the size. I use it to cover me and both my boys on rainy days while waiting for the school bus. The size is perfect. The foam handle is a nice touch. Great release button to open the umbrella and it closes just as easily as it opens. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this umbrella again should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: Leia

customer_reviews.title: My second one!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I loved my first one. Perfect size. Fiberglass parts instead of metal. Safer from lightening. Well made. But as good as this umbrella is, it can still get lost, as I found out.
customer_reviews.author: Romper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy umbrella, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this one to replace a great umbrella and we are extremely happy with the quality. It held up perfectly in a terrible snow + rain storm in NYC. It is so awesome we are purchasing one for my mother-in-law as well (another individual who walks to most places)
customer_reviews.author: Beatrix

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, light weight, keeps me dry!
customer_reviews.text: This is a big golf umbrella that is super lightweight and durable. It easily covers me and my giant backpack. I haven’t used it in high winds yet, but the quality is very good so I think it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Recommended umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This one is a huge umbrella. If you are tired dealing with weak breakable umbrellas, try this one. I held for me through the rain and wind of the Seattle winter. Just make sure you have room for it in your house (I keep mine in the trunk of my car).
customer_reviews.author: Ram Bracha

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I love the size. Nice and big without being heavy, and the fiberglass shaft keeps you from being a walking lightening rod when a storm pops up. Very comfortable handle. I like the umbrella so much i bought 2 of them, one for the house and one for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Shears

customer_reviews.title: ... few times i can tell that this is a good quality umbrella
customer_reviews.text: After using a few times i can tell that this is a good quality umbrella, very strong And big enough for even 2 people. All my umbrellas no matter how much money i paid were broked very fast with our windy weather. This one works for me well.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a summer of downpours and flimsy broken too-small umbrellas. This is sleek, easy to open/ close, and not too heavy. I get compliments on it
customer_reviews.author: MollyRDH

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Withstands wind and keeps me completely dry. It is really big and can fit myself and my wife under it together. I have been using it for a few months and it still looks brand new. Not like most others I have purchased that start falling apart after a few uses
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: This is the best umbrella I've ever owned--seriously
customer_reviews.text: This is the best umbrella I've ever owned--seriously. An absolute joy to use. Feels sturdy, even in Very windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella for price. Im only using it on my balcony for cover. Automatic.. closes good.. size perfect..light not heavy.. well made.
customer_reviews.author: L. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement for my Old Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight yet durable. The canopy size is just right. I especially like the sheath with handle for carrying when not in use. If you are looking for a great replacement for your daily use umbrella this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Cantrall

customer_reviews.title: Love the carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Only negative to this umbrella is while carrying coffee and walking into a store or getting into a car, closing it is a pain in the butt. Other wise it's held up in brutal storms
customer_reviews.author: Ally cat

customer_reviews.title: Tony umbrella
customer_reviews.text: After writing a review on this umbrella I used it today I didn't want to open it when I got it at home they say bad luck. I noticed a slight defeat in one of the edge panel stitching . But I can't be bothered retiring it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella makes me want to sing in the rain. It keeps me dry. It doesn’t flip in the wind. It’s big enough for two when I want to be nice and share it. Worth the money. Will definitely last me a while.
customer_reviews.author: WendyinLA

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Beautiful big umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Beautiful big umbrella ! Perfect for messy weather !
customer_reviews.author: Oshl

customer_reviews.title: High quality, big size
customer_reviews.text: I have never thought an umbrella can get that high quality! i hope it wont prove me wrong, but it seams like it will never break... :) Big size
customer_reviews.author: reut back

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good umbrella overall. Boston winds really require a good umbrella. So far so good, my last one broke after 2 rainy days and it's been a few good weeks of on and off usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dana SR

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.text: After a rainy weekend I can say thank you. It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: mor

customer_reviews.title: this umbrella is okay, but there's no tether
customer_reviews.text: You can make some kind of tether for this umbrella yourself, if you want, but it has nothing (no strap near the handle, or anything) to keep this umbrella in your hand. Hope you have a great grip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is great It's big and exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is great It's big and exactly what you need. It covers all your body and it can cover another person that goes with you. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Broke on second use.
customer_reviews.text: Worst umbrella ever. Must be really cheap construction, as the rib separated from the fabric the second time I opened the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: bigoaks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella very big and fit all my kids in. the quality is very good!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Sounds4u

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is awesome!!! It’s absolutely huge so not one inch of my body got wet and it’s also amazing quality...the sides did not budge in the wind...super sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha F.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchese!
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella! Super sterdy, looks good, covers you whole and the wind is a factor anymore i always spend money on cheep umbrellas that dont work.. very happy with this purchese!
customer_reviews.author: Gilad

customer_reviews.title: sturdy 'feel' and an elegant look - best umbrella that I've owned
customer_reviews.text: After a friend recently mentioned that there's such a thing as a windproof umbrella I decided to try one out. The Hi & Dry was well priced and well rated so I ordered it. I've used the Hi & Dry umbrella in a few rain storms since ordering and I can say that this is hands down the best umbrella that I've ever owned. It's got a great sturdy 'feel' and an elegant look. It even has reflectors (see image) for the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Cool slow opening, big enough and black, what could you possibly want more?
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Hands free
customer_reviews.text: What I didn’t like, was the flimsy nylon strap. I truly expected a canvas type strap. It would eliminate constantly adjusting the umbrella,due to the smooth surface of the nylon. I will have my friend to add a piece of cotton,canvas, to keep it from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as Hell
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy as hell, & also really large canopy. The price on this is great too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kat & Roux

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome umbrella! I bought it at the right time. It was pouring rain a day after I got it and it proved to be durable and stable and kept me dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sarit Katz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a big study umbrella. Durable and comfortable to hold - especially with it’s case. Has a classy look.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It sees limited use where I live but works great. One gripe is it takes 2 hands to close because the handle has to be twisted slightly
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it. Appears to be a better product than others.
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. I would have preferred a collapsible handle. Otherwise, expandible mechanism appears to be durable. Time and onset of winter will be the true test.
customer_reviews.author: tc

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Golf Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This Umbrella us very sturdy and lightweight at the same time. I love the one touch button to open it...I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hudson

customer_reviews.title: it's fairly lightweight to carry and very comfortable, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: this umbrella is really strong and doesn't turn inside out in t wind, it's fairly lightweight to carry and very comfortable, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: dani jj

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong and comfortable umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is big, and protects very well from the rain. supper strong even in very windy days. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best umbrella for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s massive, has a vent and is sturdy. Cannot find a comparable umbrella at this price. I have 3 of them
customer_reviews.author: Brendan C.

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy and holds up to the wind as advertised. Lightweight too
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Farley

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella I ever bought!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and it is so easy to use. Has great coverage during heavy rain and doesn't blow away. Already got a bunch of compliments on this purchase. Absolutely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Basya Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good quality and resistant against strong winds ... it's like in the description I advise it personally
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella rib broke after very limited use
customer_reviews.text: With very limited use one of the plastic caps on the rib broke. Other than that the umbrella was good. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Risenhoover

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, love it! Light weight and big, easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Gennadiy khotinskiy

product_meta.title: Golf Umbrella Large 48 Inches For All Purposes - Automatic Opening. Fiberglass Frame. Vented Double Canopy. Reflective Velcro Straps - Wind and Rain Resistant - Handy Shoulder Carrying Bag - Black
product_meta.description:
HI&DRY - WE CARE ABOUT YOU! 
This is Abe from Hi&Dry where our main purpose is to ensure that our customers get the very best and always come back for more. 

LET IT RAIN! THE HI&DRY STICK UMBRELLA: 
* Won’t flip 
* Won’t flap 
* Won’t Leak 
* Won’t break 

MULTIPURPOSE 
On the green playing golf or in the bleachers watching baseball, in the cool, rainy and windy days of early spring, fall and winter to the sun and heat of the summer months, this umbrella / sunshade will protect you from the elements while you have not a weather care in the world. 

BE ROMANTIC... OR NOT 
The 48-inch diameter canopy is perfect to cover 2 people - you and your beau or just a friend in need - and protect you from rain, snow, sleet, sun and wind. On a quiet stroll or dashing for the train, alone, or with someone else - we’ve got you covered (literally). 

AMAZING FEATURES: 
* Double layered pongee polyester fabric to keep the wind from getting stuck with you under the umbrella. THIS IS A WIND RESISTANT UMBRELLA. The umbrella might bend slightly under very strong winds, but wont snap and will return to it's original shape.
* Latest technology fiberglass frame and stem. 
- Lightweight - just 1.25 lbs. 
- Sturdy 
- Indestructible 
* 80-90% UV protection for round-year use. 
* Easy to open with the automatic opening mechanism. 
* EVA foam, non-slip, firm grip handle for easy handling. 
* Amazingly quick drying time so you don’t have to be embarrassed about dripping in someone’s house, office or car. 
* Reflective Velcro Straps - use them to fold down the umbrella when not in use and make sure you’re seen on dark nights. 

DON’T GO ANYWHERE WITHOUT YOUR HI&DRY UMBRELLA 
This essential tool is the difference between a fun day and a really frustrating one. Invest in quality that only Hi&Dry brings you and face the elements with confidence. 

A LIFETIME GUARANTEE SAYS IT ALL!
feature_bullets: WHEN DO YOU NEED A HI&DRY GOLF UMBRELLA? Well, if you golf, because it is big enough to cover not just you but your equipment too, while you’re out on the fairway. BUT NOT ONLY! If you want a great shield from wind and rain in any situation such as sports games, beach trips or rainy city outings, then our windproof umbrella will give you better coverage than a classic umbrella every time!

BIG ENOUGH FOR ALL With a diameter of 48 inches, the NO-NONSENSE BLACK Hi&Dry BIG Umbrella can shelter you and a partner, but it is not so big that it will bump into other people of the sidewalk. This great looking and comfortable sports umbrella will keep you dry everywhere. Pack the strong umbrella into its included waterproof case, sling the strap over your shoulder and out into the elements you go.

NEVER BATTLE AN INSIDE OUT UMBRELLA AGAIN The frame is made of flexible, strong and durable fiberglass, specially designed to be safe in lightning storms. When paired with the vented canopy made of 2 separate overlapping pieces of 190T Pongee-Polyester material, it provides enough strength to deal with gusting winds so you don’t have to. Weighing just 1.25 lbs and 27” long when closed, it’s as LIGHT AS IT IS DURABLE, COMFORTABLE AND INDESTRUCTIBLE.

FULL PROTECTION FROM THE ELEMENTS Rain, Wind and sun (yes, it has 80-90% UV protection). You’ll be using this umbrella in all seasons. OPENS AUTOMATICALLY with one hand leaving your other hand free. The EVA foam, non-slip, FIRM GRIP HANDLE for complete comfort. Close manually and enjoy the AMAZINGLY QUICK DRYING TIME of the pongee fabric. When out for an evening walk, the REFLECTIVE VELCRO STRAPS increase your visibility for added safety and peace of mind.

A WONDERFUL GIFT for the outdoor sportsman in your life. Whether he’s a player or a spectator he’ll love this fantastic umbrella. But not only… it’s the perfect gift for anyone who has to walk in the rain and sun - for family and friends for holidays, birthdays or “just because”. GET YOURS NOW for yourself or to tell someone you care. There is a LIFETIME GUARANTEE on this product.
